movies.title: Les chevaliers du ciel
movies.plot: While in an international fair of exhibition of airplanes, a French Mirage 2000 of the last generation vanishes and pilots Antoine "Walk'n" Marchelli and Sebastian "Fahrenheit" Vallois are assigned to locate the plane that is flying in a hiding position below a commercial airplane. The pilots order the Mirage to return to the base, but the Mirage attacks Fahrenheit instead, and Walk'n immediately shots the Mirage saving his partner. However, the evidences are forged by the leader of a force called "Special Missions" and Walk'n is falsely accused of not following the orders and discharged from the air force. Blacklisted in the commercial flight companies, Walk'n and Fahrenheit are pressed to join the Special Missions team, where they disclose betrayals in a net of espionage.
movies.simplePlot: While in an international fair of exhibition of airplanes, a French Mirage 2000 of the last generation vanishes and pilots Antoine "Walk'n" Marchelli and Sebastian "Fahrenheit" Vallois are ...

biography.bio: Son of a nurse and a bank employee, Benoît Magimel was born in Paris and grew up there. At age 12, he played Momo in La vie est un long fleuve tranquille (1988) by Étienne Chatiliez. He stopped his studies at age 16 to become an actor. But he had a dual personality: on one hand the man of low budget films like La fille seule (1995), Une minute de silence (1998), Le roi danse (2000), Déjà mort (1998), Thieves (1996), Selon Matthieu (2000) alongside Nathalie Baye, La fleur du mal (2003), Errances (2003), The Children of the Century (1999) with Juliette Binoche, La demoiselle d'honneur (2004) with Laura Smet, The Piano Teacher (2001) alongside Isabelle Huppert, and on the other hand also wide audience releases like Nid de guêpes (2002), Les rivières pourpres 2 - Les anges de l'apocalypse (2004), Trouble (2005), Effroyables jardins (2003), and Les chevaliers du ciel (2005). Charming, ambiguous, talented Benoit Magimel will probably illuminate the next decade, and more.
biography.name: Benoît Magimel

biography.bio: Clovis Cornillac was born on August 16, 1967 in Lyon, Rhône, France. He is an actor and director, known for A Very Long Engagement (2004), Astérix aux jeux olympiques (2008) and Eden Log (2007). He has been married to Lilou Fogli since August 30, 2013. They have one child. He was previously married to Caroline Proust.
biography.name: Clovis Cornillac

biography.bio: Géraldine Pailhas was born on January 8, 1971 in Marseille, Bouches-du-Rhône, France. She is an actress, known for Don Juan DeMarco (1994), Young & Beautiful (2013) and They Came Back (2004). She is married to Christopher Thompson. They have two children.
biography.name: Géraldine Pailhas

biography.bio: Before wanting to be actress, Alice Taglioni first began as a pianist formation to the Music Conservatory of Paris. To overcome her shyness, she takes theater courses and quickly catches the virus of comedy. She begins her film career in 2001 in the La bande du drugstore (2002) and Quatre copains (2001). She obtains one of the principal roles of Brocéliande (2003), plays in Le pharmacien de garde (2003) and Grande école (2004) in 2002. The film Mensonges et trahisons et plus si affinités... (2004) in 2003 gave her the recognition of the public. Alice next embarked on more prestigious productions of the year 2005. She was a pilot in Les chevaliers du ciel (2005), then acted in Le cactus (2005) and also acted with Gad Elmaleh in The Valet (2006) by Francis Veber.
biography.name: Alice Taglioni

biography.bio: Philippe Torreton was born on October 13, 1965 in Rouen, Seine-Maritime, France. He is an actor, known for District 13: Ultimatum (2009), Ça commence aujourd'hui (1999) and Captain Conan (1996). He has been married to Elsa Boublil since June 2008. They have one child. He was previously married to Anne-Marie Etienne.
biography.name: Philippe Torreton

biography.bio: Rey Reyes is an actress, known for Les chevaliers du ciel (2005) and L'essentiel féminin (2010).
biography.name: Rey Reyes

biography.bio: Childhood in Africa, Middle-east and South America, Peter was educated at the universities of Exeter and East Anglia in England. Became a teacher of literature and french before becoming an actor. Now based in France, he has filmed extensively worldwide: Turkey, Israel, Canada, Ivory Coast, Bulgaria, Serbia, England... He also writes, directs and keeps bees.
biography.name: Peter Hudson

biography.bio: Jean-Baptiste Puech is an actor, known for 2 Days in Paris (2007), Le Transporteur: Héritage (2015) and Les chevaliers du ciel (2005).
biography.name: Jean-Baptiste Puech

biography.bio: Christophe Reymond is an actor, known for The Family (2013), Les chevaliers du ciel (2005) and 1001 grammes (2014).
biography.name: Christophe Reymond

biography.bio: Fiona Curzon was born on June 7, 1946 in Taunton, Somerset, England as Fiona Justine Howard Bent. She is an actress, known for Femme fatale (2002), Cover Up (1974) and Les chevaliers du ciel (2005). She has been married to Oliver Tom Nickalls since 1982. They have one child. She was previously married to Noel Curzon.
biography.name: Fiona Curzon

biography.bio: Jean-Michel Tinivelli was born on July 10, 1967 in Strasbourg, Bas-Rhin, France. He is an actor, known for Le juge est une femme (1993), Empire of the Wolves (2005) and Les chevaliers du ciel (2005).
biography.name: Jean-Michel Tinivelli

biography.bio: Frédéric van den Driessche is an actor and writer, known for A Tale of Winter (1992), The Exterminating Angels (2006) and Louis Page (1997).
biography.name: Frédéric van den Driessche

biography.bio: Eric Poulain is an actor, known for Chaos (2001), District 13: Ultimatum (2009) and Les chevaliers du ciel (2005).
biography.name: Eric Poulain

biography.bio: Pierre Poirot is an actor, known for Lucy (2014), The Butterfly (2002) and Les chevaliers du ciel (2005).
biography.name: Pierre Poirot

biography.bio: Jean-Yves Chilot is an actor, known for The Valet (2006), A Perfect Plan (2012) and L'étang (2002).
biography.name: Jean-Yves Chilot

filmingLocations.location: Château de Villette, Condécourt, Val d'Oise, France
